import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect' import { selectCartItems, selectCartTotal } from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import CheckoutItem from '../../components/checkoutItem/CheckoutItem' import StripeCheckoutButton from '../../components/stripe-button/StripeButton' import './Checkout.scss' const CheckoutPage = ({ cartItems, total }) => (
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{ cartItems.map(cartItem => ) }
Total: ${total}
) const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems: selectCartItems, total: selectCartTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps, null)(CheckoutPage);
